pages.text: Orlin's Stargate, also known as the Minigate, is a$(br)small, limited use stargate. In the AUNIS mod, you$(br)can use this minigate to access a stargate located$(br)in the Nether, where you can find $(item)Naquadah$() to$(br)create the other stargates. To get back to Orlin's$(br)Stargate, dial the $(l:https://stargate.fandom.com/wiki/Earth)Earth address$(/l)
